overviewFields.title: Portable
overviewFields.value: The small, compact design makes the ISO-PUCK series the ideal speaker isolation solution to carry with you from studio to studio, session to session or anywhere you want to improve the sound clarity and provide consistent results from one location to the next for your studio monitors or speakers.

overviewFields.title: “Suction Cup” Upper Flange
overviewFields.value: The ISO-PUCK upper flange “suction cup” design adheres to the underside of the cabinet making the upper isolator live with the speaker, while the lower isolator anchors to the supporting surface. All the energy is managed within the core of the ISO-PUCK isolators which are carefully tuned to provide superior isolation and control while remaining on-axis.

overviewFields.title: Design
overviewFields.value: The low-profile design makes the ISO-PUCK series the ideal solution on meter bridges, floor stands, consoles, desktops, millwork, or soffit mounted. These isolators decouple studio monitors and speakers from the supporting surface to eliminate the transfer of energy and the resulting sound smearing and coloration. Even placement on the most solid surfaces will greatly benefit as the internal reflections coming back up from the supporting surface are attenuated to eliminate the smear and provide greater sound clarity and open up the stereo image.

overviewFields.title: Bose 251 Environmental Speakers
overviewFields.value: A combination of advanced technology, extensive research and rigorous testing, Bose 251 speakers set a new standard for performance and reliability outdoors. An Articulated Array speaker design reproduces sound over a larger listening area. The result is a wide distribution of sound, so you can enjoy music equally from both speakers as you move around outdoors. And the patented multi-chamber enclosure helps reproduce music’s lower reaches with exceptional fullness and depth, without audible distortion, from a small design. Weather-resistant mounting brackets and hardware are also included to allow for easy installation. And it’s all backed by a 5-year transferable warranty.

name: Definitive Technology Descend DN8 8" Subwoofer (White)

overviewFields.title: Designed to play loud & clear. Sized to fit anywhere.
overviewFields.value: Sized to fit anywhere, the DN8 performs bigger, louder, and clearer than other 8” subwoofers. Its unique 3XR™ Architecture creates three times the radiating surface area of similarly sized subs, providing more bass. And because it uses passive bass radiators, you get that big, thrilling bass with no port noise distortion.

overviewFields.title: 3XR Architecture for Loud & Clear Bass
overviewFields.value: Descend Series subwoofers feature Definitive Technology’s new 3XR™ Architecture, providing three times the bass-producing radiating surface area of a traditional ported subwoofer. This extra surface area moves more air, resulting in massive bass. And because 3XR doesn’t use ports, it also provides crystal-clear lows with no port noise distortion.

overviewFields.title: Fits Nearly Everywhere
overviewFields.value: The DN8 is just over one foot wide, enabling it to fit virtually any room or system. And due to its 3XR™ Architecture, it performs like a 10” subwoofer even though it has an 8” driver. With the DN8, you get tons of bass from a one-foot sub.

overviewFields.title: Custom Class D Digital Amplification
overviewFields.value: The DN8 is equipped with a 500W peak custom Class D digital amplifier, designed to get the most out of the DN8’s 3XR™ Architecture. This custom amplification gives the Descend DN8 enough power and efficiency to play as low as 35Hz.

overviewFields.title: Control & Customization
overviewFields.value: You can customize the DN8 to the needs of your own application, system, and space. The DN8 features built-in controls to dial in volume, low-pass filter, and phase (0/180°) for optimum bass levels. Set its power toggle to Auto on/off or DC control for fast and easy on/off power switching.

overviewFields.title: Connects to Any System
overviewFields.value: The DN8 delivers deep, dynamic bass to any home theater or music system. Easily connect it via LFE or stereo line-level RCA inputs (cables not included).

overviewFields.title: Pair Multiple Subwoofers for Optimal Performance
overviewFields.value: While a single subwoofer adds bass and enhanced realism to any system, it may not provide consistent frequency response throughout the room. Properly using multiple subwoofers designed to be used together like the DN8 flattens the frequency response. The result is smoother bass throughout the room, helping eliminate boomy locations or dead spots.

overviewFields.title: Three Decades of Thrilled Customers
overviewFields.value: Definitive Technology has been thrilling movie and music enthusiasts for decades with high-performance, high-value subwoofers that consistently deliver deep, impactful, dynamic bass to home theater and music systems.

overviewFields.title: Limited Warranty, Built to Last
overviewFields.value: Manufactured under the strictest quality controls, Definitive Technology speakers and subwoofers are built for the long haul. All Definitive Technology products come with a limited warranty (1 year on amplifier, 2 years on driver).

overviewFields.title: Reference subwoofer performance just went micro.
overviewFields.value: Chest-pounding, musical bass with deep low-frequency extension, from a shockingly compact 10-inch cabinet. Many micro subwoofers have tried, all have failed. Until now. The miniature yet mighty SVS 3000 Micro subwoofer seamlessly blends into any room and speaker system, energizing space with astonishingly rich, effortless, and detailed bass for music and home theater that’s all the more impressive given its micro-sized enclosure.

overviewFields.title: Fully-Active Dual-Opposing 8-inch Drivers – Defy the Laws of Physics with Room-Shaking Output with Pinpoint Accuracy
overviewFields.value: A first-ever design for SVS, two fully active 8-inch woofers are mounted on opposite sides of the sealed cabinet and move in perfect unison to generate stunning low-frequency output with crisp, musical transients. The usable surface area of two fully-active 8-inch woofers firing in opposite directions achieves performance on par with significantly larger single-driver subwoofers. Its tight, punchy output obliterates multi-driver passive radiator subwoofer designs known for their bloated and boomy sound.

overviewFields.title: Innovative Motor Assembly - Maximizes Current Delivery for Dual-Driver Array
overviewFields.value: An oversized, vented motor structure is optimized for efficient thermal and mechanical-energy management in a confined space. The massive electromagnetic force produced by the motor, in symphony with the high current driving power of the Sledge amplifier, allows the 3000 Micro to maximize the output potential of the dual drivers.

overviewFields.title: Sledge STA-800D2 Amplifier – Massive Output with Precise Driver Control
overviewFields.value: A driver is only potential and requires an equally potent amplifier. Extreme challenges existed for SVS engineers when designing an amplifier capable of powering fully-active dual 8-inch drivers at reference levels in a micro-sized cabinet. How to maximize SPLs while maintaining accuracy? How to optimize the potential of room gain? How to maintain proper cooling while achieving massive SPLs?

overviewFields.title: Sophisticated 50 MHz DSP Engine – Unrivaled Processing Power from a Home Audio Subwoofer
overviewFields.value: A 50 MHz Analog Devices DSP, normally reserved for high-end separate audio components, delivers sophisticated control and custom response curves optimized for real-world output and acoustically tuned room gain.

overviewFields.title: 3000 Micro Smartphone App – Easiest Way Ever to Manage Subwoofer DSP and Control
overviewFields.value: The most convenient way ever to control volume, access multiple DSP functions, and program custom preset tuning profiles optimized for music, movies, gaming, and more. All accessible with a single touch. Adjust crossover frequencies, a three-band parametric EQ, polarity, room gain, and more, all from your favorite seat.

overviewFields.title: Rear Panel Intelligent Control Interface (ICI)
overviewFields.value: Rear-panel SVS Intelligent Control Interface (ICI) provides control options and connections for the subwoofer’s most critical functions.

overviewFields.title: Acoustically Inert and Rigidly Braced Sealed-Cabinet Design
overviewFields.value: Handsomely styled to complement the finest home theater and HiFi systems, yet compact enough to stash out of sight, the acoustically optimized 3000 Micro sealed cabinet design blends with any room or setup. Features extra-thick MDF front baffle and rigid internal bracing for a resonance-free environment that remains motionless even at peak playback levels, solving a long-time issue of “dancing” micro subwoofers. Serves as a blank canvas for uncompromised subwoofer performance.

name: AudioQuest Red River RCA Male to RCA Male Cables - 4.92 ft. (1.5m) - 2-Pack

overviewFields.title: Red River
overviewFields.value: North America has two Red Rivers, North and South. Red River South has been home to many peoples; it once was the border between the US and colonial Spain, and today forms part of the border between the rival states of Texas and Oklahoma.

overviewFields.title: Solid Perfect-Surface Copper (PSC) Conductors
overviewFields.value: Perfect-Surface Copper has an astonishingly smooth and pure surface. Proprietary metal-processing technology protects the wire’s surface at every stage of drawing and fabrication. When high-purity low-oxide copper is kept as soft, pure, and smooth as possible, it becomes a wonderfully low-distortion conductor. For over 30 years AudioQuest has pioneered the use of superior metals; yet most people were surprised by this huge leap in performance. PSC clearly outperforms previous AQ metals that cost over ten times as much. Electrical and magnetic interaction between strands in a conventional cable is the greatest source of distortion, often causing a somewhat dirty, harsh sound. Solid conductors are fundamental toward achieving Red River’s very clean sound.

overviewFields.title: Nitrogen-Injected Hard-Cell Foam Insulation
overviewFields.value: Nitrogen-Injected Hard-Cell Foam insulation is used exclusively in most of AudioQuest’s video and digital audio cables. Similar to Foamed-PE, it is nitrogen-injected to create air pockets. ‘Hard’ foam is used because the stiffness of the material allows the conductors in the cable to maintain the same relationship with each other along the full length of the cable, thus ensuring that the characteristic impedance of the cable is consistent.

overviewFields.title: Metal-Layer Noise-Dissipation System (NDS)
overviewFields.value: 100% shield coverage is easy. Preventing captured RF Interference from modulating the equipment’s ground reference requires AQ’s Noise-Dissipation System. Noise-Dissipation System prevents a significant amount of RFI from reaching the equipment’s ground plane.

overviewFields.title: Cold-Welded, Gold-Plated Terminations
overviewFields.value: This plug design allows for a connection devoid of solder, which is a common source of distortion. Because the ground shells are stamped instead of machined, the metal can be chosen for low distortion instead of machinability.

overviewFields.value: RRIVER015R

overviewFields.title: Sound Is Survival. Let Your Voices Be Heard.
overviewFields.value: Sound like a pro with the JBL Quantum Stream Studio microphone. Whether you’re gaming, streaming or recording by yourself, with a co-host, or with a roomful of guests, you can quickly switch between four different pickup patterns so that everyone can be heard. No additional gear required to level up your game. You’ll always know how loud things are getting thanks to the RGB VU meter, and the dynamic range compressor makes sure everyone’s voice stays at the same level. Streaming a game? Fully control the balance between the game sounds and your own commentary. Use the included JBL QuantumENGINE PC software to adjust EQ, apply noise reduction, or customize the mic’s radiant RGB lighting.

overviewFields.title: Triple Condenser Microphones For Perfect Streaming
overviewFields.value: Stream or record one, two, or more voices through three lightweight, fast-moving, and sensitive (37dB) 14mm condenser mics, cardioid, all with a wide, flat frequency range (50~16kHz). At 192kHz/24 bits recording, your streams and recordings will sound studioquality and capture every nuance of what you’re saying.

overviewFields.title: Four Selectable Voice Pick-Up Patterns
overviewFields.value: A single button on the microphone’s front quickly changes between four voice-pickup patterns: cardioid for when you’re recording or streaming by yourself, bi-directional if you’re interviewing someone on the opposite side of the mic, stereo if you and your co-host are sitting on the same side of the mic or you’re recording a musical instrument, and omnidirectional for any stream or podcast where more than two people are talking.

overviewFields.title: Dynamic Range Compressor
overviewFields.value: Don’t worry about trying to talk at the same volume all the time: the dynamic range compressor keeps your voice from clipping if you get too loud, or gives you a boost if you’re speaking too softly.

overviewFields.title: Tap-To-Mute Button with RGB Ring Indicator
overviewFields.value: Feel a cough coming on? Just tap the touch sensor on top of the mic to mute yourself briefly. The RGB lights around the grille will turn red to remind you that your audience can’t hear you.

overviewFields.title: RGB VU Meter
overviewFields.value: Easily keep an eye on your volume levels with the real-time RGB VU meter that surrounds the control knob. Too low? Try turning up the gain. Going into the red? Your listeners might be hearing clipping and distortion, so ease back.

overviewFields.title: Easy Voice Monitoring
overviewFields.value: Monitor your voice directly from your headphones using the 3.5mm connection, controlling your volume on the microphone itself and using the included JBL QuantumENGINE software to adjust your EQ. You can also easily control the balance between PC sound and the amount of voice rerouted to your headset while streaming. The Audio/Voice Monitor feature allows for the best balance between the sound of your game and the level of your voice.

overviewFields.title: Universal Mounting Solution
overviewFields.value: Use the included stand to hold the mic, or if you’ve already got a boom arm or C-clamp system in your setup, it will screw right into either.

overviewFields.title: Made from Premium and Sturdy Material
overviewFields.value: The JBL Quantum Stream Studio mic stands firm on the table thanks to the sturdy alloy stand made of zinc. Premium components such as the metal body and grill make this mic suitable for any professional streaming setup.

overviewFields.title: JBL QuantumENGINE Compatibility
overviewFields.value: With the included JBL QuantumENGINE software, you can quickly adjust EQ and gain to fine-tune your sound, mute and unmute yourself, apply noise reduction, perform a quick mic test, and even customize the mic’s radiant RBG lighting, all from your computer screen.

name: iFi Audio iSilencer Max USB-C Noise Filter with Active Noise Cancellation

overviewFields.title: For Silence You Can Hear
overviewFields.value: iFi understands the importance of disconnecting from the daily grind and immersing yourself in music. Whether you're deep in thought on a creative project or finding solace in the soothing tones of your favorite tracks, pristine audio clarity is essential. However, USB-related connection noise and interference can disrupt your listening, disturbing your retreat from the distractions of the world. The iSilencer Max eliminates unwanted USB noise through cutting-edge technology, ensuring your listening experience remains undisturbed and pure.

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Active Noise Cancellation 3 Technology

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Jitter Elimination

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: REBalance® Technology

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Supports up to 20V/5A

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: High-speed USB 3.0 Data Transfer

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Aluminum Housing Enhances Cooling and Durability

overviewFields.title: Silence, Simplified
overviewFields.value: A computer power supply’s USB bus is often sourced from an inadequately filtered switch -mode power supply, that injects noise into connected equipment leading to data errors, loss, and jitter. Simply insert the iSilencer Max between your computer and DAC to effectively cancel out all incoming noise, leaving you with a cleaner, warmer and more transparent sound.

overviewFields.title: Military Precision
overviewFields.value: Inspired by military radar cancellation techniques, our proprietary Active Noise Cancellation 3 technology duplicates incoming noise signals from the USB and inverts the polarity, effectively cancelling out incoming electromagnetic and radio interference. This technology means that measured noise drops by 100x (40dB) in comparison to the common noise filter.

overviewFields.title: Maximum Compatibility
overviewFields.value: The input of the iSilencer Max now supports up to 100W (20V/5A). This greatly expands the list of devices it is compatible with and removes it from the confines of USB DAC Applications.

overviewFields.title: Perfectly Balanced
overviewFields.value: The REBalance technology inside the iSilencer Max rebalances the USB signal to address DC offset and jitter, leading to distortion, and in turn, data packet errors. This technology cleans up the digital signal and ensures the signal received by the DAC is identical to the original source.

overviewFields.title: Speed without Compromise
overviewFields.value: iSilencer Max supports USB 3.0 high-speed data transfer, significantly faster than USB 2.0 standards. This means that it does not impair playback of hi-res audio files, regardless of quality or file size.

overviewFields.title: Interference Immune
overviewFields.value: The aluminum housing of the iSilencer Max is not just for durability. The chassis acts as a heatsink, enhancing cooling performance of the unit. It also ensures complete shielding against Electromagnetic Interference (EMI).

overviewFields.title: Tune Into Nashville’s Soul with Powerful Sound Performance
overviewFields.value: The Klipsch Nashville features dual 2.25” full-range drivers for 360° audio while dual passive radiators provide deep, resonating bass. While small in stature, the Nashville’s exceptional engineering provides deep bass and clear vocals for superior audio performance on the go.

overviewFields.title: Plenty Of Power For A Long Night Of Honky Tonkin’
overviewFields.value: This small-but-mighty Bluetooth speaker can last up to 24 hours on a single charge. Whether you’re traversing Music City’s streets or taking a long ride outta town, the Klipsch Nashville’s long-lasting battery has you covered.

overviewFields.title: Rugged As Blue Ridge, Smooth Like The Mississippi
overviewFields.value: Enjoy IP67 dust and waterproof rating with this travel-ready Bluetooth speaker. The Klipsch Nashville is completely protected from dust and submergible up to one meter for 30 minutes.

overviewFields.title: Best Bluetooth Connectivity Tech On The Market Today
overviewFields.value: Wireless connectivity is a must-have for your on-the-go lifestyle. That’s why the Klipsch Nashville features Bluetooth 5.3 true wireless technology for seamless stereo playback. This portable speakers remembers up to 8 devices for ultimate playlist flexibility and control.

overviewFields.title: Charged Up for The Modern World
overviewFields.value: Enjoy 18W USB-C charging for fast, effective powering while reverse USB-C charge functionality (10W) lets you pull on some of that energy in a pinch to recharge your smartphone or other mobile device.

overviewFields.title: Better With Friends: Broadcast Mode
overviewFields.value: Party people, pay attention – the Klipsch Nashville featured broadcast mode to allow playback on up to 10+ Klipsch speakers at once! Just put the desired speakers into broadcast pairing mode while audio is playing and enjoy mono signals being sent to the added devices.

overviewFields.title: Built-In Microphone for Calls
overviewFields.value: Plans change, and maybe your solo hike has turned into a group hang on Broadway Street. You won’t miss a beat with the Klipsch Nashville’s built-in microphone, allowing you to pause on your music to take a quick call, all without having to search for your cellphone first.

overviewFields.title: Klipsch Connect App Enabled
overviewFields.value: With just a tap on your Klipsch Connect app (available for free in the app store), you can custom EQ settings for your ideal bass, mid-range, and treble, receive over-the-air firmware updates, and receive access to support.

overviewFields.title: The Evolution of a Hi-Fi Classic
overviewFields.value: With a history going back to 1974, the Monitor XT series is the next generation of Polk’s critically acclaimed Monitor line of speakers, now featuring Hi-Res Audio Certification and a new tweeter, woofer, and cabinet designs to improve the sound of anything you’re listening to.

overviewFields.title: Hi-Res Audio Certified
overviewFields.value: Monitor XT15’s new Terylene dome tweeter makes them perfect for enjoying high-resolution audio from Apple Music, Tidal, Amazon Music HD, Qobuz, and Spotify HiFi.

overviewFields.title: Clean, Tight, Effortless Bass
overviewFields.value: MXT15’s dynamically balanced 5.25” woofer plays punchy, loud, and low, delivering Polk’s famously smooth mid-range and powerful, effortless bass.

overviewFields.title: Dolby Atmos Certified and DTS:X Compatible
overviewFields.value: Compatible with the latest Dolby Atmos and DTS:X surround sound enabled AV receivers and 4- and 8-ohm amplifiers, Monitor XT does not require specialized equipment to deliver great sound.

overviewFields.title: Flexible Placement
overviewFields.value: Use MXT15 as your front or surround speakers on shelves or stands. You can also wall mount MXT15 for use as a height module in an immersive surround sound setup. Plus, their midnight black finish and modern design will make a bold statement in any room.
